Ok, I was trying all the common things, it seems that your daemon isn't being executed on login, which you already knew. The problem now is to find out why.
any ideas?

Until you find out why, you can always add that daemon to the session so it gets run on login. You can add the daemon to the sessions in System -> Preferences -> Sessions  and go to the Startup Programs tab.
do i just add that command i just ran?
I'm afraid I don't know much about the startup scripts for gnome. Yes, add this to the sessions:  gnome-settings-daemon   (don't add the "&")
